summary: Simulate a click on the \"start game\"-Button on the Skyrim Launcher
descriptionHtml:
This program starts Skyrim, wait for the Launcher and then simulate a mouseclick on the \"Start\"-Button.

You can change some parameters (parameters are optional, the default-values should fit in the most cases).

SkyrimSkipLauncher.exe <programtostart> <WindowClass> <WindowTitle> <Childnumber>

<programtostart>
Default: \"steam://rungameid/72850\"
This starts Steam-ID 72850 = Skyrim. You can also enter the path to a exe. When you enter \"nostart\" no program will started.

<WindowClass>
Default: \"#32770\"
Skyrim-Launcher Window-Class Name. Needed for finding the Launcher-Window.

<WindowTitle>
Default: \"Skyrim\"
Skyrim-Launcher Window-Title. Needed for finding the Launcher-Window.

<Childnumber>
Default: \"5\"
The 5th button is the Start-Button (Option would be 4)
author: GPI
